alert.note: Alert for Custer; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:30AM MDT until July 05 at 11:00AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 AM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CUSTER AND NORTH CENTRAL POWDER RIVER COUNTIES... At 529 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 21 miles northeast of Colstrip to 8 miles northwest of Ashland, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Garland and Twelve Mile Dam. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
